caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. In a dilapidated town, a young boy is learning to write, and an old man is watching over him, teaching him. Afterward, the scene shifts to an indoor setting where a man and a woman are naked, but they are not engaged in intercourse. They are talking and having a conversation about various matters.Then, inside a castle, a short and stout man is walking. He enters an office where another man is working. They both sit down for a conversation. They appear to have some level of distrust towards each other, but they eventually continue the discussion.
